main.name: Diogo Malagueta
main.bio: My name is Diogo Malagueta, I'm a Junior Web Developer. Ever since I learned the first programming language, i have pursued programming as a passion but at the meantime i enlisted me on the Portuguese navy. I was a sailor man on the portuguese tallship Nrp Sagres nevertheless i was always seeking more knowledge on Web developing. Today as a Junior Web Developer with basic knowledge i am fully motivated to learn more and overcome challenging projects that will help solidify my career as a web developer and also contribute to the company success.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details on how I can help your business reach further.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
